title: Angelina Jolie to take all six children back to the orphanage.
subtitle: According to a false news site, Angelina Jolie was returning her adopted children to orphanages after she broke up with Brad Pitt.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: After the separation from Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie decided to return her adopted children to orphanages in order to focus on her career.
